dcterms:description: This dataset is used for experimental validation of tomographic and radar-based algorithms in microwave imaging, specifically focusing on non-line-of-sight (NLOS) scenarios.
dcterms:title: NLOS area

dcterms:creator: G. Oliveri
F. Zardi
P. Rocca
M. Salucci
A. Massa
dcterms:description: This dataset involves the constrained design of passive static electromagnetic skins (NR-EMS) for radar applications.
dcterms:title: NR-EMS

dcterms:creator: J. Gunther
R. West
N. Crookston
T. Moon
dcterms:description: This dataset is related to maximum likelihood synthetic aperture radar image formation, particularly for highly nonlinear flight tracks.
dcterms:title: Synthetic aperture radar image formation

dcterms:creator: S. Tebaldini
M. Manzoni
D. Tagliaferri
M. Rizzi
A. V. Monti-Guarnieri
C. M. Prati
U. Spagnolini
M. Nicoli
I. Russo
C. Mazzucco
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a map of the signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) in urban environments as sensed by automotive synthetic aperture radar imaging.
dcterms:title: SNR map

dcterms:creator: A. Aubry
A. De Maio
M. Rosamilia
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on radar sensing in non-line-of-sight (NLOS) environments aided by reconfigurable intelligent surfaces.
dcterms:title: RIS-aided radar sensing
